details.title: Dirichlet form of product of variational fractals
details.abstract: Much effort has gone into constructing Dirichlet forms to define Laplacians on self-simlar sets. However, the results ts have only been successful on p. c. f. (post critical finite) fractals. We prove the existence of a Dirichlet form on a class of non-p. c. f. sets that are the product of variational fractals.
